document_data.name: Nikka
document_data.mainbody: '''Nikka''' was one of ten guards stationed at the [[Hinnar's Red Wizard enclave|enclave]] run by the young [[Red Wizard]] [[Hinnar]].
document_data.Abilities: Nikka was tough, strong, and dexterous.
document_data.Possessions: Like the other guards at the enclave, Nikka was trained in the expert use of the [[bastard sword]] and possessed a finely crafted example. Nikka also carried a [[longspear]] and a [[composite longbow]] and was trained in ranged combat at short range.
document_data.Activities: Nikka worked in alternating shifts guarding the six watch platforms, observing the sales booth, or patroling the compound grounds.
document_data.History: When adventures came to the enclave, seeking information about the kidnapping of [[Talf]] and [[Elonn]], Nikka was completely ignorant of the fact that the two young men had been taken by the [[wizard]] [[Kizzaf]].
